game.shortDescription: This is Obstacle game. Agent Spy-der Pig with the mission of destroying the most powerful thing in the dark world. The higher you go, there will be more obstacles and challenges. Let's fight together with Mr.derPig to see who will get to the best position in this journey.
game.shortDescriptionEn: This is Obstacle game. Agent Spy-der Pig with the mission of destroying the most powerful thing in the dark world. The higher you go, there will be more obstacles and challenges. Let's fight together with Mr.derPig to see who will get to the best position in this journey.
